hero.title: Explore the Cosmos with ASTRO FUTURE!
hero.subtitle: Learn about asteroids, comets, and more through interactive 3D simulations.

what_is.title: What is ASTRO FUTURE?
what_is.description: ASTRO FUTURE is an educational platform that transforms complex space data from NASA into interactive experiences. Explore asteroids and comets in 3D, modify their orbits, and see how the impact on the planet changes. With our virtual assistant, learning about space has never been more fun!

simulations.title: 3D Simulations
simulations.description: Explore space in a visual and interactive way.

assistant.title: Virtual Assistant
assistant.description: Learn with the help of a smart guide who will assist you every step of the way.

learning.title: Active Learning
learning.description: You don't just read about space, you experience it!

why_it_is_important.title: Why is it important?
why_it_is_important.description: The STEM vocation in Peru is low, but with ASTRO FUTURE, we transform learning about science and technology into something interactive and fun. Our mission is to make the mysteries of the universe understandable for everyone, from students to space enthusiasts.

cta.title: It's your turn to explore the cosmos!

noObjectsFound.title: No objects found
noObjectsFound.subtitle: Try adjusting your search or filters.

simulation.eccentricityHint: Controls how elongated the orbit is.
simulation.speedHint: Adjusts the object's speed in the simulation.

hypothetical.title: Hypothetical Scenarios
hypothetical.label: What if...?
hypothetical.placeholder: e.g., ...its orbit were twice as eccentric?
hypothetical.placeholderGeneric: e.g., How big is the universe?

page.title: Simulation Center
page.subtitle: Coming soon
page.description: An interactive simulation area is under construction.

quiz.title: Cosmic Quiz
quiz.description: Test your knowledge about the universe.

minigame.title: Quiz Result
minigame.bad: Close call! That was a close one.
minigame.no_results: Play the quiz to see your result.
